alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 6:39AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN FLAGLER...SOUTHEASTERN ST. JOHNS AND EAST CENTRAL PUTNAM COUNTIES THROUGH 715 AM EDT... At 639 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers capable of producing a landspout over San Mateo, or near East Palatka, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Hastings, Saint Augustine Beach, Crescent Beach, Saint Augustine Shores, Butler Beach, Saint Augustine South, San Mateo, Spuds, and Anastasia. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM EDT for northeastern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
